name: Gun Raiders
abstract: Gun Raiders is a free-to-play VR shooter!  Chat with friends while you mow down enemies in multiple game modes while jetpacking through the air or climbing from wall to wall monkey-style!

detail.app_release_note:
Patch Notes 0.8.222 - Soar into Shimmer Isle: Season 8!

Welcome to Shimmer Isle!  Uncover the Season 8 Battle Pass, featuring 100 tiers of new loot and free Raider Coins. Explore the new Hub in the clouds and wield the powerful Shuriken sidearm! Conquer the Garden Control Map and experience the intensity of the new Multi-Control Game Mode.  Dive into new player created maps Sublimity and Industrialâ€”Season 8 awaits!

New: Shimmer Isle Battle Pass with 100 tiers of loot
New: Shimmer Isle Hub
New: Shuriken sidearm
New: Garden Control Map
New: Multi-Control Game Mode (Multiple control points to capture.  Available on most maps)
New: Chat Game Mode (Chill mode where there's no shooting and you can just talk)
New: Player created maps: Sublimity & Industrial
Update: Crossbow damage reduced from 7 to 5 damage per tick
Update: Gauntlets no longer reduce incomming explosive damage
detail.app_supported_platforms: PICO 4, PICO Neo3 Link, PICO 4 Pro
